name: Frappe v15 Dev (Generic)
postAttachCommand: bash -lc 'if [ -d "${BENCH_HOME:-/workspaces/frappe-bench}" ]; then (pgrep -f "bench start" >/dev/null || nohup bench start >/tmp/bench.log 2>&1 &) || true; fi'
postStartCommand: bash -lc '(sudo service mariadb start || true) && (sudo service mysql start || true) && (sudo service redis-server start || true) && if [ -d "${BENCH_HOME:-/workspaces/frappe-bench}" ]; then (pgrep -f "bench start" >/dev/null || nohup bench start >/tmp/bench.log 2>&1 &) || true; fi'
